name: Nine Three Lives
description:
PLAYING IN FULLSCREEN IS RECOMMENDED

Half cat - half Grim reaper! Use the power of your own dead bodies to progress through levels!

Controls:

Arrows - Move

Spacebar - Jump and Progress through text

Credits:

Original Art, Concept and Code by me

Cave Background: https://opengameart.org/content/seamless-cave-background

Forest background: https://wallpaperaccess.com/minimalist-forest-hd

This is a short proof of concept and submission for MiniJam92. done in two days.
